body:
@luca-heltai, this is all up for discussion: 

I have added a few new variants (choosing the C++ standard, choosing to build the examples, adding ninja the chosen build tool build tool). At the same time I noticed that this package is getting really large and unwieldy. So I propose shuffling around and categorising all of the settings, to make this package easier to navigate.
title: Reorganise deal.II package and add some new settings
